resources.string: Tulum
Beach Clubs
Restaurants
Cenotes
Niken
Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila Km 8.47, Zona Hotelera Tulum, 77760 Tulum, Q.R
Vibrant beach club with a great menu, drinks, and more at a great price
Lula
Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila km 8.1, Tulum Beach, 77760 Tulum, Q.R.
A laid back spot for chilling by the beach with a delicious menu
Chiringuito
Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila 9-3, Tulum Beach, Zona Hotelera, 77728 Boca Paila, Q.R.
Up scale beach club with incredible food and kiteboarding lessons!
Vagalume
Supermanzana QROO 15, Tulum Beach, 77776 Tulum, Quintana Roo
A chic beach club with luxurious cabanas and picturesque art
Ukami
C. Asunci√≥n 16, La Veleta, 77760 Tulum, Q.R.
Incredible sushi, Japanese x Mexican fusion, must try
La Negra Tomasa
Andromeda Ote 14, Tulum Centro, 77760 Tulum, Q.R.
Locals favorite seafood restaurant. Beautiful loft style restuarant, must try a tostada.
Casa Jaguar
KM 7.5, Av. Boca Paila, 77760 Tulum, Q.R.
Upscale restuarant, perfectly dimmed, with the jungle feel. Perfect for date night or any celebration
il bacaro
C. 7 Sur, La Veleta, 77760 Tulum, Q.R.
Beatiful atmosphere with tile, lighting, and plants. Incredible pizza and pasta, must try both!
Cenote Atik
7FQV+3H, 77797 Rancho Viejo, Q.R.
A stunning, crystal-clear freshwater sinkhole surrounded by lush jungle, offering a tranquil spot for swimming and exploration
Cenote Dos Ojos
77774 Quintana Roo
a famous, breathtaking underwater cave system with two connected sinkholes, known for its crystal-clear waters and exceptional snorkeling and diving opportunities
Cenote Calavera
Carretera Tulum, Av. Coba Km 1.7, 77796 Tulum, Q.R.
unique, open air cenote with a striking skull-shaped entrance, offering an adventurous spot for cliff jumping and swimming in its refreshing waters
Cenote Vesica
PARCELA No. 198Z-2P-1 EJIDO, 77760 Tulum, Q.R.
Serene and picturesque cenote, featuring crystal-clear waters surrounded by rocky walls and lush greenery, making it a perfect spot for swimming and relaxation
